question: Provide an extensive list of all the pathogens you are aware of and classify them
query:
#+ endpoint: http://localhost:7007
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
 PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
 SELECT DISTINCT ?name 
WHERE
 { ?subject a schema:InfectiousDisease . 
?subject schema:additionalProperty ?additionalproperty . 
?subject schema:name ?name . 
}

question: Provide an extensive list of the pathogens in China
query:
#+ endpoint: http://localhost:7007
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>

SELECT ?name
WHERE {
    ?subject a schema:InfectiousDisease .
    ?subject schema:additionalProperty ?additionalproperty .
    ?subject schema:name ?name .

    ?subject schema:spatialCoverage ?spatialcoverage .
    ?spatialcoverage schema:name ?spatial_name .
    FILTER (REGEX(?spatial_name, "China"))

}
GROUP BY ?name
